reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No residue on clothes, gentle, really works.
reviews.reviewText: I have super sensitive skin and this causes no irritation at all. You can apply it even after shaving your underarms and it doesn't hurt, burn or sting. I've used it for several years and it also doesn't react when you sweat and cause irritation or staining or residue on your clothing.It's clear and soaks into the skin quickly. It doesn't rub off or leave any residue (clear or white) on your clothes and I've never gotten staining on anything from it (even delicate items like silk shirts).The secret to it working is that you need to apply it after you shower (after drying your underarms). And you need to also apply it at night before bed (if you shower in the morning, if evening or night then after your shower is fine). I apply it twice a day (when getting dressed, after a shower or before bed) usually.There is no scent to it at all. It does what it's supposed to and keeps you fresh and clean. It works well, is inexpensive, gentle and doesn't harm your clothes. I don't even try others, this is so good and it works so we'll it's the only one I'll use. I tried quite a few brands of drugstore deodorants in clear, invisible (scented and non scented, I prefer non scented) and this works better than anything I've used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this deodorant for years and it has been hard to find in brick and mortar stores. So happy to have found in here! Perfect for my sensitive skin and works great for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aluminum Free Deodorant that Works Wonders
reviews.reviewText: Since aluminum deodorant is connected to breast cancer and family history, I went looking for an affordable, well-working deodorant. I'm so thankful I found Almay. It's in my budget. It works better than the deodorant I've used in the past.I love that it's in a gel. It makes it easier to apply. It keeps me feeling fresh and smell-free. I also stay dry in stressful situations with this gel.The packaging is simple. Because of this, I believe the savings are passed on to the consumers. Thank you, Almay for making a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was having an allergic reaction to my deodorant, and my dermatologist recommended this one to try. I normally use a solid deodorant so this liquid gel is quite different.It’s totally wet going on and needs to dry. A half an hour after applying it was sticky on one side. Turns out it hadn’t dried completely, so after lifting that arm up for a bit, it dried. Stickiness was gone after drying.I sweat quite a bit. This deodorant does not stop sweating, but it does cut down on the yucky smell.Overall, I’ve had no bad skin reaction to this sensitive deodorant so I’m pretty happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to find deodorant
reviews.reviewText: For years I have used Almay deodorant. It’s odorless, easy to apply, lasts a long time, it’s effective and travels well. It is now difficult to find in stores. So I was happy to get it quickly from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best deodorant I have used! Perfect for very sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: For some time I have been having problems with darkening irritation in my armpits from using deodorant. In my desperation I bought and tried different deodorants: Very expensive, natural, spray, stick, roll-on, gel and every time I thought I had found a good one, one or two days later my armpits would looked like they were burned, very red and itchy. In my desperation I saw a video on YouTube where they reviewed the best deodorants for people with sensitive skin and one of the people who commented on the video talked about this deodorant. So I bought it and glad I did!! It is absolutely the best deodorant I have ever used in my entire life!! I have no irritation, it doesn't leave my armpits dark, I don't smell bad and it's cheap!! At first I was worried about the feel of the gel, but after applying it, it dries so my armpits don't feel wet. Perfect!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff works great at keeping me dry and keeping odor away, but it makes me underarms itch really bad. I believe the culprit is dipropylene glycol. A fair number of people are allergic to propylene glycol, and I've suspected I am. My fault for not paying more attention to the ingredients before ordering. I wish the company wouldn't include a fairly common allergen in a sensitive skin product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for deodorant that does not irritate my skin. I usually get very itchy under arms from normal deodorant. I’ve tried a bunch of natural ones, but they just leave me sweaty and I don’t like that feeling. What I love about this one is that I can crank it up just a little bit and I use my fingers. I use half of one underarm and then half the other, if that makes any sense. This also makes the deodorant last a very long time. Therefore, getting more for my money. It doesn’t take much at all to be effective. Also, Dr. Dray from YouTube, deodorant works really well if you apply some at night. Which I do so I can easily apply this twice a day with no irritation. I put it on AutoShip.

Non merita ne anche una stella. 1. odore sgradevole. contiene alluminio come principi attivo, costa troppo per quello che è, in più non si può fare il reso... Questa cosa del reso è una cosa inaccettabile. NON COMPRATELO....

reviews.reviewTitle: Product arrived used and half empty.. there is also no return policy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2012
reviews.reviewText: After having problems with all deodorants I've tried over the years, I stumbled across this one, and as it was fragrance free and by Almay, a brand I trust, I decided to give it a try. I read a review by someone else with the same problem as I have with deodorants, ie., sore itchy underarms after using for about 3 days, and it was mentioned that these Almay ones didn't cause a problem. There is another Almay one here on Amazon so I ordered both. Happy to say, so far so good, no problems. So, my thanks go to the lady who reviewed either this one or the roll-on one, and thanks to Amazon for including Almay in the listings.
The stickyness is too much disappointment to even try it on n check if it works
